name: Bodmin Airfield
about: Bodmin Airfield, home to the Cornwall Flying Club, is a premier flight training facility located in Cardinham, Cornwall. Our highly experienced and enthusiastic instructional team specialize in modular training, offering a comprehensive Private Pilot's Licence (PPL) course taught entirely in-house. The airfield benefits from unrestricted class G airspace, ideal for flight training. With two runways and a friendly atmosphere, Bodmin Airfield also features the Windsock Caf√©, open seven days a week. We offer introductory flights, trial lessons, and bespoke flying experiences, including gyroplane and Cessna flights. Our instructors are approachable and attentive, ensuring a supportive learning environment. Whether you're a novice or an experienced pilot, Bodmin Airfield provides the perfect setting to achieve your flying goals.
